entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
